locale.message: Unfortunately, you cannot access this app.
You can’t go to this location. Wait a few minutes and try again.
You can see it in your inventory.

I have earned the ":award:" trophy in Avataria! Join me and you can get the same trophy!
Cannot perform this action in fullscreen mode. Go back to window mode?
Rooms can be connected together by corridors. But before you buy the room, you'll need to choose where to place the corridor. Continue?
There are currently no videos available for viewing. Please try again later
Could not break. The item is already broken.
Congratulations! You get 10 gold coins as a gift for visiting Avataria!
Friends! Help me, I need :component:! Please send it to me and I'll repay in kind!
You don't have buddies yet. To add a buddy you have to meet someone first.
:name: wants to meet you. Do you accept?
:name: will learn about your desire to meet in a moment.
Try moving to a location with a better connection. If you still have trouble connecting, try again later.
Repeat the action without using the prohibited words
Inappropriate language is prohibited. Be courteous to others. Otherwise we will ban you from using the app.
You need to make up first if you want to dance together!
:name: would love to dance with you! :)
:name: doesn't want to dance with you :(
:name: wants to dance with you. Will you go for it?
:name: will soon find out that you want to dance.
We have restricted your chat options due to the use of profanity
:reason:. You can enter the application in :leftTime:
You were kicked out of the room.
You were kicked out of the room. Do you want to leave?
(p. 7) Spreading rumors, slander, or other defamatory information about Tortuga LLC, other users, game services, game promotions, game activities, partners of the Company, or the Game as a whole.
(p. 8) Spam/flooding in any of the Game's information channels.
(p. 9) Disseminating advertisements, including the dissemination of any links to Internet pages within the game.

(p. 10) Using any obscene, offensive, provocative, promotional, or other disallowed words or symbols in the Game for names or descriptions of characters, other game objects, and guilds or any other player organizations or societies.

(p. 11) Using profanity or insults during gameplay in general chat and communication. Also, in any form of game communication (all channels and types of messaging), using any threats of violence (physical or otherwise), advertising drugs, pornography, or third-party resources with these items publicly available, or discrimination against any race, ethnicity, religion, culture, ideology, sex, language, or political affiliation, as well as encouraging any such actions or statements to be committed by other users.

(p. 12) Intentionally committing any act which makes it difficult or impossible for other users to access the game or for the Company to fulfill its obligations. Creating intentional interference for other players' gameplay in a way not provided for by regular gameplay.

(p. 13) Publishing information or uploading files containing malicious software, corrupted or modified files or data, or other similar software programs that may damage the game, disrupt other computers or communication, or violate the integrity of user accounts (game accounts).

(p. 14) Creating user, item, object, or player society/organization names or any other insignia which indicates that this user, item, object, or society/organization belongs to Tortuga LLC or its partners. Representing one's self to other users as a current or former employee of the company or one of its partners.

(p. 15) Disseminating or intentionally using information to gain access to other user accounts (game accounts) in the Game, on the Game's website, in the Game forums, for Game services. Also, disseminating links to third-party resources containing such information.
(p. 16) Submitting false information when appealing to the Administration, or falsifying data already provided.
(p. 19) Fraud (deceiving other players with the goal of personal gain, including the goal of gaining access to other players’ login data).

(p. 20) Excessive formatting, including “SHOUTING” (messages in all caps) and writing in AnNoYiNg capitalization patterns, including the partial use of excessive formatting (30% or more of an entire text).
(p. 3) Selling/buying/trading/transferring/giving away a game account. Disseminating information regarding an intention to commit such actions by the user himself or any third parties.

(p. 4) Implementing or promoting the following actions for any in-game object, function, item, additional game functions, or game currency: buying/selling/trading for out-of-game currency or any other out-of-game item(s) of value.
(p. 6) Using or disseminating information about in-game errors or software bugs.
You need to change into a bathing suit to get into the bath. Do you want to change?

You need to become best friends before you can call yourself a couple.

You can earn silver by tending to the garden or cleaning the street.
You can earn silver by visiting friends' apartments and picking up their garbage.
You are not authorized in any networks. You will not be able to restore subscription on another device without authorization. Continue?
VIP status opens up a whole new world of opportunities. Spoil yourself with luxury, live life to the fullest and get maximum pleasure, because you're truly awesome and unique!
Only someone with VIP status can buy this item. Do you want the status?
Items must be kept in a wardrobe, which you don't have yet. Buy a wardrobe and put it in your apartment to have somewhere to keep your clothes.
You cannot break a VIP's item if you don't have a VIP status yourself. Do you want to buy VIP?
You cannot break your own things.
This object cannot be edited or removed from the room.
You cannot remove the object from the room as long as it holds other objects.
You cannot paint your own walls
You cannot remove the object from the room as long as it is broken.
You cannot remove the object from the room until food production is complete .
You cannot remove an object from the room while it is busy.
You need to erase the graffiti before you can change the wallpaper.
I wonder what's inside? You can find out once January 1, 2014 arrives!
:name: is suggesting you put on a race! How about it?

To participate in races, you need to have at least one car in your apartment.

Dress code for this event restricts people from appearing in public without a suit.

Wonderful! Now you'll never miss a sale, and you'll always be up to date about what's going on in the world of Avataria!

Don't miss this opportunity! You'll be one of the first to learn about the latest special offers and discounts! Plus, you'll get unique in-game bonuses! Allow us to send this highly-informative newsletter to your email by clicking below.

Add and rearrange items and select a pose for your avatar. The photo will be taken at 800x600 resolution. The new avatar will replace the shadow you have now.

Like it? In Avataria's photo studio, you can take lots of photos like this one. Use all kinds of themes and decorations. And don't forget to get your friends in the photo, too!

A captivating world with plenty of fun for everyone. Furnish your apartment, go to work, meet new friends, play cards. The world of Avataria is yours for the taking!

The beach season is coming to a close, but the summer never ends in Avatar Life! Blow the dust off your trusty water gun, go to the beach, and battle other players for the title of the best sharpshooter out there! May the most accurate player win!
There’s not much time! Hurry up!
Choose the player and tap the Water Fight button to battle another player.
Choose your actions in the fight, hit the weak spots and earn points. If you think that your opponent will attack this round, defend yourself!
The fight lasts for 5 round. The player that gets the most points wins the fight.
You need better equipment to get stronger! Swimsuits or Swimming Trunks that provide bonuses and even water pistols are always available in the Store!
